 class ShaderNormalMap
          Normal map shader
- Blinn-Phong
- normal + diffuse + specular + AO + displacement + reflection + shadow maps
- point and directional lights (use with "lights: true" material option) Based on three.js code.
 class ShaderParticleBasic
          Simple Particle shader.
 class ShaderPhong
          Phong shading - lighting model three-dimensional objects, including models and polygonal primitives.
